parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma3

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>0.50

</value></part><part><name>arg</name>=<value> global

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Mines

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Checks if the given mine is active.

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> '''mineActive''' obj

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> obj: [[Object]]

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Boolean]]

</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>[[if]] ([[mineActive]] _mine) [[then]] {[[hint]] "BOOM!"}; </code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[allMines]], [[detectedMines]], [[mineDetectedBy]], [[createMine]], [[revealMine]]
</value></part></template></root>
